problems.title: Why your CV <gradient>isn't working</gradient>
problems.subtitle: Most candidates make these mistakes without knowing
problems.problem1_desc: 70% of CVs are automatically rejected due to poor formatting, wrong keywords, or irrelevant content.
problems.problem2_desc: Using the same CV for all jobs ignores specific role requirements and industry standards.
problems.problem3_desc: Many candidates struggle with interviews, from common questions to effective self-presentation.
problems.problem4_desc: Candidates rarely receive feedback on rejections, missing critical insights for improvement.
problems.problem5_desc: Customizing CVs, preparing interviews, and analyzing job posts takes too much time.
problems.problem6_desc: Standing out among hundreds of candidates is increasingly difficult without a clear edge.

why_resume.card3_comment: "Let's change <red>participated</red> to <green>Led</green>. It's much more powerful."

faq.title: Frequently Asked <gradient>Questions</gradient>
faq.q1: Can you review my CV before I order?
faq.a1: Yes, and it's completely free! Get the FREE Review and you'll receive a detailed assessment of how your CV currently stands and how it can be improved.
faq.q2: What does the Free CV Review include?
faq.a2: First, I review your CV with the critical eye of a Senior Engineer. Then I return it to you as a Google Doc with a score and detailed assessment of each section, a list of what's missing, and recommendations for improvement.
faq.a3:
• First draft (4 business days): I rewrite your CV on the DebugCV platform using an ATS-friendly format, improve every bullet point, and add comments with personalized suggestions.
  • You give feedback: You reply to comments or leave notes. There is no time limit.
  • Final version (1-2 business days): I finalize the CV based on your feedback. Unlimited revisions included in Level Up and above.
faq.q4: How long does it take to receive my CV?
faq.a4: The first draft is delivered in 4 business days (or 1 business day if you choose the Power Move package). After you give your feedback, the final version is delivered in 1-2 business days.
faq.q5: Can I ask for additional changes after delivery?
faq.a5: Absolutely. You have one free round of revisions with the Break Into Tech package, and unlimited revisions for 30 days with Level Up or Power Move.
faq.q6: Will my new CV be ATS compatible?
faq.a6: All CVs I write are ATS compatible, which mainly means the text content is readable. There is a lot of misinformation online about ATS, mostly from companies trying to sell you products.
faq.footer: Can't find the answer to your question? contact

reviews_list.name: Laura Martinez
reviews_list.text: The CV Pablo created was phenomenal. I received calls from top companies within a week. His understanding of what tech recruiters look for is unmatched. The way he structured my technical achievements made my profile stand out immediately.

reviews_list.name: Carlos Rodriguez
reviews_list.text: After struggling with my CV for months, Pablo transformed it completely. The technical depth and clarity he brought made all the difference. I got my dream job! The process was very professional and fast.

reviews_list.name: Ana Lopez
reviews_list.text: Working with DebugCV was the best decision. The collaborative process ensured every detail was perfect. My CV now truly reflects my technical experience and Ive noticed a significant increase in recruiter responses.

reviews_list.name: Alejandro Rivera
reviews_list.text: I was skeptical at first, but the results speak for themselves. 4 interview requests in the first week after updating my CV. Worth every penny! The investment paid for itself many times over with my new salary offer.

reviews_list.name: Adrian Villa
reviews_list.text: You save time and gain confidence in yourself. I always found it challenging to know what to do and how to present myself when making a CV. Its hard to know if something is good. This service gives you speed but, most importantly, expertise from a recruiters point of view. And of course confidence. Confidence in your resume and that its better than anything you could have done yourself.

reviews_list.name: David Quiroga
reviews_list.text: The attention to detail and technical understanding is incredible. My CV went from generic to compelling. I received multiple offers within a month. I would definitely recommend this service to any software engineer looking to advance their career.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: The only CV writing service created by a Senior AI Engineer, for tech professionals
about.story_title: Engineering, AI and Passion for Talent
about.story_p1: I'm Pablo Guinea. Software Engineer (Senior AI at HP) and CTO at Acebo Investments (Venture Capital).
about.story_p2: At Acebo Investments I analyze profiles and tech startups. I've learned to identify the exact difference between a good engineer and one worth investing in.
about.story_p3: That's the gap I close with DebugCV. Combining my technical experience and my criteria as a talent analyst to transform your profile into a high-value proposition for the market.
about.mission_text: Help technical professionals showcase their true value by translating their experience into the language that recruiters and hiring managers understand. We believe every engineer deserves a CV that opens doors, not closes them.
about.diff1_text: As a CTO in VC, I know what high-growth companies look for. Your CV won't just show code, it will show value and impact.
about.diff2_text: We understand architecture, design patterns and tech stacks‚Äîyour CV will speak the technical language.
about.diff3_text: Through the DebugCV platform, we work together in real-time to ensure every detail is precise and impactful.
about.cta_text: Let's write a CV that gets you the interviews you deserve.

linkedin-optimization.title: LinkedIn Optimization

technical_interview.title: Technical Interview Preparation Guide
technical_interview.subtitle: Master coding interviews, system design, and technical screenings with proven strategies.
technical_interview.intro_content: Technical interviews assess how you think under pressure. This guide offers a concrete action plan to avoid 'LeetCode burnout' and focus on the fundamentals.

algo.title: Algorithms & Data Structures
algo.desc: Live Coding tests where you solve algorithmic problems. The key is not memorizing code, but patterns.

system.title: System Design
system.desc: For Mid/Senior roles. Design scalable architectures (e.g., Twitter, Netflix).
system.list: Load Balancers, SQL vs NoSQL, Caching, Sharding.

takehome.title: Take-Home Projects
takehome.desc: Projects to do at home. Code quality, testing, and documentation are evaluated.

debug.title: Debugging / Code Review
debug.desc: Fix bugs or critique existing code. Look for 'Code Smells' and security issues.

technical_interview.algo_strategy_desc: Don't memorize solutions. Recognize <bold>patterns</bold>. Here are the most common ones:
technical_interview.communication_desc: Silence is your enemy. Use the <bold>REACTO</bold> protocol to structure your thinking:

reacto.r: <bold>R</bold>epeat: Repeat the question to confirm understanding.
reacto.e: <bold>E</bold>xamples: Create example inputs/outputs and edge cases.
reacto.a: <bold>A</bold>pproach: Describe your solution at a high level before coding.
reacto.t: <bold>T</bold>est: Do a manual 'Dry Run' with your examples.

technical_interview.conclusion_content: Deliberate practice beats talent. Treat the interviewer as a colleague and collaborate.

job_search_methods.title: Effective Job Search Methods
job_search_methods.subtitle: Stop sending CVs into the void. Access the hidden job market.
job_search_methods.intro_content: Clicking 'Apply' on 50 jobs a day will lead to burnout. Diversify your channels.
job_search_methods.hidden_market_desc: 80% of jobs are never publicly posted. They are filled through referrals.
job_search_methods.strategy1_desc: Companies love referrals. It's cheaper and safer for them.
job_search_methods.script_title: Script: How to ask for a referral (Coffee Chat)
job_search_methods.script_content:
Hi [Name], I saw you work at [Company]. I've been following your work on [Product] and find it fascinating.

I'm exploring new opportunities and [Company] is my top choice. Would you have 10 mins to tell me about the engineering team culture?

No strings attached. Thanks!
job_search_methods.strategy2_desc: Find the Engineering Manager on LinkedIn and send a 'Value Message'.
value_msg_list: Personalize (mention a post of theirs or company news)
Soft CTA ('Open to connecting?', not 'hire me')
job_search_methods.strategy3_desc: Use specialized boards with less noise: Wellfound (Startups), HackerNews Jobs, RemoteOK.
job_search_methods.tracking_desc: Use our Job Tracker so you don't lose control of your processes.

linkedin_optimization.title: LinkedIn Optimization for Engineers
linkedin_optimization.subtitle: Your 24/7 Landing Page. Attract recruiters while you sleep.
linkedin_optimization.intro_content: LinkedIn is a search engine. If you don't have the right keywords (SEO), you are invisible.
linkedin_optimization.photo_desc: Professional photo, neutral background, friendly smile. Custom banner (code, conference, minimalist).
linkedin_optimization.headline_desc:
The most important part for SEO. Use the formula:
Role | Main Tech Stack | Unique Value Proposition
linkedin_optimization.headline_good: Senior Frontend Engineer | React, Next.js, TS | Ex-Uber | Performance Enthusiast
linkedin_optimization.about_desc: Your 'About' is your story. Talk about your passion, problems you solve, and your current stack. Include a 'Technical Skills' list at the end for the algorithm.
linkedin_optimization.experience_desc: Focus on quantifiable achievements, just like on your CV.
linkedin_optimization.skills_desc: Fill out all 50 skills. Get endorsements and recommendations from former colleagues.
linkedin_optimization.activity_desc: Don't be a ghost. Comment on industry leaders' posts. Share articles. Activity makes you visible to 2nd and 3rd-degree networks.
linkedin_optimization.cta_desc: Make sure your CV matches your LinkedIn.
